title: Homework 1: Even Instagram Started Somewhere
description:
In this assignment you will be writing two classes that interact with each other.  This assignment has two parts:

Part 1: Photo Class - Due Wednesday, February 5, by 11:30p.m.
Part 2: Library Class - Due Wednesday, February 10, by 11:30p.m.

You will be submitting on Web-CAT (see assignment document for further details.) There is a 48-hour grace period for submitting, HOWEVER this comes with a penalty:
- if you submit between 11:31pm on Friday, September 20 and 11:30pm on Saturday, September 21, we will apply a 10% penalty.
- if you submit between 11:31pm on Saturday, September 21 and 11:30pm on Sunday, September 22, we will apply a further 10% penalty (for a total of 20% penalty.)
- we will not accept any submissions after 11:30pm on Sunday, September 22    

Read the instructions of the assignment carefully (attached) and let us know if you have any questions.
